basic_element Module¶

Created on Wed Oct 10 13:18:49 2018

@author: kunal

class basic_element.BasicElement(line)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines the basic elements of spice file e.g: a resistor, inductor It also defines the weight on each port of device

capacitor()[source]¶

cap: c7 net7 vinp c1 The assumption is 2 port network

get_elements(num_pins=2)[source]¶

Extract pins and values

i_source()[source]¶

Cur_source: i3 vdd! net1 DC=idc The assumption is 2 port network

inductor()[source]¶

Res: c7 net7 vinp c1 The assumption is 2 port network

resistor()[source]¶

Res: c7 net7 vinp c1 The assumption is 2 port network

transistor()[source]¶

transistor: m5 net5 phi2 0 0 nmos_rvt w=81e-9 l=20e-9 nfin=3 The assumption is 3 port network pins = [drain, gate, source]

v_source()[source]¶

v_source: v1 vbiasp1 0 DC=vbiasp1 The assumption is 2 port network

vcvs_source()[source]¶

v_source: E1 (Vinp net2 net3 net2) vcvs gain=1 The assumption is 4 port network

basic_element.parse_value(all_param, vtype=None)[source]¶

parse the value parameters for each block and returns a dict
